action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for making those changes. I only have small changes for consistency. I have attached an image above to show what I mean by the two points below.


  1. please include the colon (punction) between "Buy Used Equipment" and product title

  2. Keep the tab "Specification Sheet" labeled next to create order as the machine service history will be available there instead of at the bottom of the page



Kind regards,

Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING COORDINATOR

M: 08 8210 4000
A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033

40mins madam @ricaV2

Hi Xavier, 

Thanks for your time yesterday. We have prepared a new product template specifically for the sale of used equipment. Please review and let me know if you would like any further updates. Once approved, we'll add it to the main navigation.

ticket updates:

  • created new single product page for - BUY USED EQUIPMENT
  • added 'Buy Used Equipment' as product tag

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi @ricaV2 here is the update following a call with Xavier. 

1. Introduce a new header option "BUY - USED EQUIPMENT" Screenshot 1. 
2. Position the new option after the existing (position #3)
3. Update the product template:
- to include a selection (dropdown?) for buy or hire. This will allow new products to be designated as either a hire or a buy. 

- Update the front end to show correct selection - hire or buy. 

- to make the "check availability" tab hide-able (for example when creating a product for sale rather than hire). Screenshot 2. 

- Make the "specifications" tab hide-able.

Hi Chris,

I do apologise as I was out of the office on Friday and am working from home today.

I am happy to hop on a call with you. Give me a shout anytime between 9am - 5pm today or tomorrow and I can help identify the changes needing to be made.

M: 0401 915 839

Kind regards,

Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING COORDINATOR



P: +61 8210 4000
M: 08 8210 4000 A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033





Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.

I was wondering if you have time on Monday to go through it?
